name: King's Squire (In Effect)
description: During this Round, the next time you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 2 fewer Elemental Dice.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>During this Round, the next time you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 2 fewer Elemental Dice.
